Tarti:
Last time we spoke Reclous told me that the Turek War Hounds that Orcs always parade around had been bothering him. I think you should kill a few Turek War Hounds before coming to Reclous.
Turek War Hound are usually led by the Turek Orc Footmen. Defeat them all and them talk to Reclous. That will help you to gain his trust.
Since the mainland has been quite unsafe lately, I'll send you right to your destination.
